name: ListZoomH323SipDevices
description:
Retrieve all H.323/SIP devices on a Zoom account.

Use this tool to get a list of all H.323/SIP devices configured in a Zoom account. Ideal for managing or auditing video conferencing infrastructure using Zoom's Room Connector feature.

parameters.name: records_per_call
parameters.description: The number of records to return in a single API call when listing H.323/SIP devices. Adjust to manage response size.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: use_page_number
parameters.description: **Deprecated.** Indicates if the `page_number` should be used for pagination. Use `next_page_token` instead.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated.** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for paginating large result sets. Expires after 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: **Deprecated.** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated.** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
